mapper.insert: INSERT INTO CHATMESSAGE (M_NUM, P_NUM, TIME, MESSAGE, ATTFILE, G_NUM, CM_NUM) VALUES (#{m_num}, 1, SYSDATE, #{message}, '첨부파일', 1, CM_SEQ.NEXTVAL)
INSERT INTO CHATMESSAGE2 (M_NUM, ROOM_ID, TIME, MESSAGE, ATTFILE, G_NUM, CM_NUM2) VALUES (#{m_num}, #{room_id}, SYSDATE, #{message}, '첨부파일', 1, CM2_SEQ.NEXTVAL)
mapper.update: UPDATE MEMBER SET CONTENT = '자리비움' WHERE M_NUM = 1
mapper.select: SELECT C.M_NUM, C.P_NUM, TO_CHAR(C.TIME, 'AM HH12:MI') AS TIME, C.MESSAGE, C.ATTFILE, C.G_NUM, C.CM_NUM, G.G_NUM, G.ID, G.PASSWORD, G.G_NAME, G.ADDRESS, G.EMAIL, G.PHONE, G.REGDATE, M.M_NUM, M.C_NUM, M.G_NUM, M.AUTHORITY, M.ROLE, M.D_NUM, M.CONTENT FROM GUEST G, MEMBER M, CHATMESSAGE C WHERE G.G_NUM = M.G_NUM AND C.M_NUM = M.M_NUM ORDER BY C.CM_NUM

SELECT C.M_NUM, C.ROOM_ID, TO_CHAR(C.TIME, 'AM HH12:MI') AS TIME, C.MESSAGE, C.ATTFILE, C.G_NUM, C.CM_NUM2, G.G_NUM, G.ID, G.PASSWORD, G.G_NAME, G.ADDRESS, G.EMAIL, G.PHONE, G.REGDATE, M.M_NUM, M.C_NUM, M.G_NUM, M.AUTHORITY, M.ROLE, M.D_NUM, M.CONTENT FROM GUEST G, MEMBER M, CHATMESSAGE2 C WHERE G.G_NUM = M.G_NUM AND C.M_NUM = M.M_NUM AND C.ROOM_ID = #{room_id} ORDER BY C.CM_NUM2
SELECT * FROM GUEST G, MEMBER M WHERE G.G_NUM = M.G_NUM ORDER BY G.G_NAME

SELECT C1.ROOM_ID, C2.G_NAME, C2.ROLE, C2.CONTENT FROM ( SELECT * FROM CHATJOINER J, MEMBER M, GUEST G WHERE J.M_NUM = M.M_NUM AND G.G_NUM = M.G_NUM AND M.M_NUM = 6) C1, (SELECT * FROM CHATJOINER J, MEMBER M, GUEST G WHERE J.M_NUM = M.M_NUM AND G.G_NUM = M.G_NUM AND M.M_NUM != 6) C2 WHERE C1.ROOM_ID = C2.ROOM_ID

SELECT C1.ROOM_ID, C2.G_NAME, C2.ROLE, C2.CONTENT, C2.M_NUM FROM ( SELECT J.ROOM_ID FROM CHATJOINER J, MEMBER M, GUEST G WHERE J.M_NUM = M.M_NUM AND G.G_NUM = M.G_NUM AND M.M_NUM = 6) C1, (SELECT G.G_NAME, M.ROLE, M.CONTENT, M.M_NUM, J.ROOM_ID FROM CHATJOINER J, MEMBER M, GUEST G WHERE J.M_NUM = M.M_NUM AND G.G_NUM = M.G_NUM AND M.M_NUM != 6) C2 WHERE C1.ROOM_ID = C2.ROOM_ID

SELECT C2.ROOM_ID, G.G_NAME, M.ROLE, M.CONTENT, C2.MESSAGE, TO_CHAR(C2.TIME, 'AM HH12:MI') AS TIME FROM CHATMESSAGE2 C2, MEMBER M, GUEST G WHERE C2.M_NUM = M.M_NUM AND M.G_NUM = G.G_NUM AND C2.ROOM_ID = #{room_id}
SELECT * FROM GUEST G, MEMBER M WHERE G.G_NUM = M.G_NUM AND G_NAME LIKE '%'|| #{searchMember} ||'%' ORDER BY G_NAME
SELECT C.M_NUM, C.ROOM_ID, G.G_NAME, M.ROLE, M.CONTENT FROM GUEST G, MEMBER M, CHATJOINER C WHERE G.G_NUM = M.G_NUM AND C.M_NUM = M.M_NUM AND M.M_NUM = #{m_num}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO CHATJOINER VALUES (CJ_SEQ.NEXTVAL, (SELECT MAX(ROOM_ID) FROM CHATROOM), #{m_num})
